<documents>
<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>
<pddl_problem>
(define (problem roverprob8271) (:domain rover)
(:objects
	general - lander
	colour highres lowres - mode
	rover0 rover1 rover2 rover3 - rover
	rover0store rover1store rover2store rover3store - store
	waypoint0 waypoint1 waypoint2 waypoint3 waypoint4 waypoint5 waypoint6 - waypoint
	camera0 camera1 camera2 camera3 camera4 camera5 - camera
	objective0 objective1 objective2 objective3 - objective
	)
(:init
	(visible waypoint0 waypoint6)
	(visible waypoint6 waypoint0)
	(visible waypoint1 waypoint0)
	(visible waypoint0 waypoint1)
	(visible waypoint1 waypoint2)
	(visible waypoint2 waypoint1)
	(visible waypoint1 waypoint5)
	(visible waypoint5 waypoint1)
	(visible waypoint2 waypoint0)
	(visible waypoint0 waypoint2)
	(visible waypoint2 waypoint4)
	(visible waypoint4 waypoint2)
	(visible waypoint2 waypoint6)
	(visible waypoint6 waypoint2)
	(visible waypoint3 waypoint5)
	(visible waypoint5 waypoint3)
	(visible waypoint4 waypoint0)
	(visible waypoint0 waypoint4)
	(visible waypoint4 waypoint1)

	(visible waypoint3 waypoint4)
	(visible waypoint5 waypoint0)

	(visible_from objective0 waypoint0)

	(visible_from objective2 waypoint0)

	(visible_from objective3 waypoint3)

	(visible_from objective3 waypoint5)
)

(:goal (and
	(communicated_soil_data waypoint6)
	(communicated_soil_data waypoint0)
	(communicated_soil_data waypoint3)
	(communicated_soil_data waypoint4)
	(communicated_rock_data waypoint4)
	(communicated_rock_data waypoint3)
	(communicated_rock_data waypoint0)
	(communicated_rock_data waypoint1)
	(communicated_image_data objective3 colour)
	(communicated_image_data objective2 colour)
	(communicated_image_data objective3 lowres)
))

(:metric minimize (total-energy-used))

 
)
</pddl_problem>
</documents> 

<information>
The user will give as input a natural language constraint that must be translated into PDDL3.0. The translation will be used by a PDDL planner.
</information>

<instructions> 
- Translate the input constraint into correct PDDL3.0.
- The resulting PDDL3.0 constraint must capture the same meaning as the initial input constraint.
- Remember that PDDL3.0 constraints are state-based. They can only refer to existing precates and fluents, thus, not to actions.
- Be sure to include temporal logic like operators in your translation.
- Format your answer such as there is no preambule and such that the PDDL translation is between the tags <pddl> and </pddl>.
</instructions>

<user_input>
Rover1 should take all images
</user_input>

Let me analyze this constraint: "Rover1 should take all images"

Looking at the problem, I need to understand what images need to be taken. From the goal state, I can see:
- (communicated_image_data objective3 colour)
- (communicated_image_data objective2 colour) 
- (communicated_image_data objective3 lowres)

So there are 3 images that need to be taken:
1. objective3 in colour mode
2. objective2 in colour mode  
3. objective3 in lowres mode

The constraint is saying that rover1 should be the one to take all of these images.

Looking at the domain, the action that takes images is `takeimage`:
```
(:action takeimage
   :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
   :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
          (on_board ?i ?r)
          (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
          (supports ?i ?m)
          (visible_from ?o ?p)
          (in ?r ?p)
          (>= (energy ?r) 1)
   )
   :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
          (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
          (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
          (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
          (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
   )
)
```

The effect of this action is `(have_image ?r ?o ?m)` which means rover ?r has an image of objective ?o in mode ?m.

So the constraint "Rover1 should take all images" means that for all the images that need to be communicated (based on the goal), rover1 should be the one who has those images.


I'm exploring how to formalize this constraint in PDDL, focusing on the specific image requirements for rover1. The goal involves three distinct images across different objectives and modes. I'll need to translate these requirements into a precise PDDL representation that ensures rover1 is responsible for capturing all these specific images.

The key challenge is converting action-based constraints into state-based predicates. I'll map the communication goal to the underlying requirement that rover1 must be the source of these specific images before communication occurs.

The constraint essentially means that whenever an image is communicated, rover1 must be the rover who originally captured that particular image configuration.

In temporal logic terms, this translates to three distinct eventually conditions:
- rover1 will acquire the colour image of objective3
- rover1 will acquire the colour image of objective2
- rover1 will acquire the lowres image of objective3

These conditions ensure rover1 is the exclusive image source for the planned communication objectives.

Looking at this constraint, I need to identify what images need to be taken based on the goal requirements. From the goal, I can see three images need to be communicated:
- objective3 in colour mode
- objective2 in colour mode  
- objective3 in lowres mode

The constraint "Rover1 should take all images" means rover1 should be the one who has all these images (since taking an image results in the `have_image` predicate).

<pddl>
(and 
    (eventually (have_image rover1 objective3 colour))
    (eventually (have_image rover1 objective2 colour))
    (eventually (have_image rover1 objective3 lowres))
)
</pddl>

The user wants to translate "Rover1 should take all images" into PDDL3.0. But PDDL3.0 constraints are state-based and can only refer to existing predicates and fluents, not to actions.

- (communicated_image_data objective2 colour)

The constraint "Rover1 should take all images" means that rover1 should be the one who has these images before they are communicated.

In PDDL3.0, constraints are typically expressed as:
- always (condition)
- sometime (condition)
- at-most-once (condition)
- sometime-after (condition1) (condition2)
- sometime-before (condition1) (condition2)
